Breadth-First.Explanation: General descriptive observation without specific hypothesis, collecting broad clues
Continued broad clue collection and tentative area suggestions (Müllheim or Munich suburb)
Divergent hypothesis generation listing multiple candidate suburbs and regions
Broad exploration of new potential locations based on bin brands and plant clues
Further divergent consideration of alternative regions (Alsace, Austria, Bavaria)
Listing multiple final neighborhood hypotheses with shallow comparisons

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused verification of the Munich hypothesis using specific architectural and street details
Depth-First.KeyElement: Munich hypothesis (flat terrain, poplars, curb style, blue bins)

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent hypothesis generation of 'Zur Alten Post' village based on poplars and rural road features
Depth-First.KeyElement: Hypothesized location 'Zur Alten Post' near Danube

Depth-First.Explanation: Targeted analysis of Dorfstrasse in Obermenzing vs Untermenzing using church tower and farmhouse clues
Detailed verification of gable-facing buildings orientation against Eversbuschstraße wiki description
Depth-First.KeyElement: Gable orientation and former farmhouse numbering

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused evaluation of Munich hypothesis elimination using bin absence and signage conventions
Convergent narrowing to Allach-Untermenzing using license plate and rural street characteristics

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: After broad observations, the model adopts a specific Munich hypothesis and begins targeted verification
Following depth analysis of 'Zur Alten Post', the model returns to broad exploration of other suburbs
Transition from listing multiple candidates to focused verification of Dorfstrasse hypothesis
After depth elimination of Munich, the model reverts to broad search for alternative regions
Following broad comparisons, the model converges on Allach-Untermenzing for detailed consideration
After focused narrowing, the model again explores a range of final neighborhood candidates
